verses.verse: Now <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H802>harlot<s%> <S%H2181><s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> in to her.

[When it was told] to the <S%H5841>Gazites,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8123>"Samson<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H2008>here,<s%>" they <S%H5437>surrounded<s%> [the place] and <S%H693>lay<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> for him <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> at the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city.<s%> And they <S%H2790>kept<s%> <S%H2790>silent<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "[Let us wait] <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> then we will <S%H2026>kill<s%> him."

Now <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H2677>midnight,<s%> <S%H3915><s%> and at <S%H2677>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H270>took<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>posts<s%> and <S%H5265>pulled<s%> them up <S%H5973>along<s%> with the <S%H1280>bars;<s%> then he <S%H7760>put<s%> them on his <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> and <S%H5927>carried<s%> them up to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>opposite<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> <S%H3651>this<s%> it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that he <S%H157>loved<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H7796>Sorek,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1807>Delilah.<s%>

And the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to her, and <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H6601>"Entice<s%> him, and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>where<s%> his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> [lies] and <S%H4100>how<s%> we may <S%H3201>overpower<s%> him that we may <S%H631>bind<s%> him to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him. Then we will <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H505>eleven<s%> <S%H3967><s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> [pieces] of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>"

So <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H4100>where<s%> your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> is and <S%H4100>how<s%> you may be <S%H631>bound<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> you."

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H518>"If<s%> they <S%H631>bind<s%> me with <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>fresh<s%> <S%H9199>cords<s%> that have not been <S%H9162>dried,<s%> then I shall <S%H2470>become<s%> <S%H2470>weak<s%> and be like <S%H259>any<s%> [other] <S%H120>man.<s%>"

Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>brought<s%> up to her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>fresh<s%> <S%H9199>cords<s%> that had not been <S%H9162>dried,<s%> and she <S%H631>bound<s%> him with them.

Now she <S%H3427>had<s%> [men] <S%H693>lying<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> in an <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>room.<s%> And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are upon you, <S%H8123>Samson!<s%>" But he <S%H5423>snapped<s%> the <S%H9199>cords<s%> as a <S%H6616>string<s%> of <S%H5296>tow<s%> <S%H5423>snaps<s%> when it <S%H9552>touches<s%> <S%H784>fire.<s%> So his <S%H3581>strength<s%> was not <S%H3045>discovered.<s%>

Then <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> you have <S%H8524>deceived<s%> me and <S%H1696>told<s%> me <S%H3577>lies;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me, <S%H4100>how<s%> you may be <S%H631>bound.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H518>"If<s%> they <S%H631>bind<s%> me <S%H631>tightly<s%> with <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have not been <S%H4399>used,<s%> then I shall <S%H2470>become<s%> <S%H2470>weak<s%> and be like <S%H259>any<s%> [other] <S%H120>man.<s%>"

So <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with them and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are upon you, <S%H8123>Samson!<s%>" For the [men] were <S%H693>lying<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> in the <S%H2315>inner<s%> <S%H2315>room.<s%> But he <S%H5423>snapped<s%> the ropes from his <S%H2220>arms<s%> like a <S%H2339>thread.<s%>

Then <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> "Up to <S%H2008>now<s%> you have <S%H8524>deceived<s%> me and <S%H1696>told<s%> me <S%H3577>lies;<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me <S%H4100>how<s%> you may be <S%H631>bound.<s%>" And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H518>"If<s%> you <S%H707>weave<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of my <S%H7218>hair<s%> with the <S%H4545>web<s%> [and <S%H8628>fasten<s%> it with a <S%H3489>pin,<s%> then I shall become <S%H2470>weak<s%> and be like <S%H259>any<s%> other <S%H120>man.<s%>"

So while he <S%H3462>slept,<s%> Delilah took the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of his <S%H7218>hair<s%> and wove them into the <S%H4545>web<s%>]. And she <S%H8628>fastened<s%> [it] with the <S%H3489>pin,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are upon you, <S%H8123>Samson!<s%>" But he <S%H3364>awoke<s%> from his <S%H8142>sleep<s%> and <S%H5265>pulled<s%> out the <S%H3489>pin<s%> of the <S%H708>loom<s%> and the <S%H4545>web.<s%>

Then she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H349>"How<s%> can you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I <S%H157>love<s%> you,' when your <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not with me? You have <S%H8524>deceived<s%> me <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> and have not <S%H5046>told<s%> me <S%H4100>where<s%> your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> is."

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> she <S%H6693>pressed<s%> him <S%H3117>daily<s%> with her <S%H1697>words<s%> and <S%H509>urged<s%> him, that his <S%H5315>soul<s%> was <S%H9527>annoyed<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

So he <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H3605>all<s%> [that was] in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to her, "A <S%H4177>razor<s%> has <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5927>come<s%> on my <S%H7218>head,<s%> for I have been a <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from my mother's <S%H990>womb.<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> I am <S%H1548>shaved,<s%> then my <S%H3581>strength<s%> will <S%H5493>leave<s%> <S%H4480><s%> me and I shall <S%H2470>become<s%> <S%H2470>weak<s%> and be like <S%H3605>any<s%> [other] <S%H120>man.<s%>"

When <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H3605>all<s%> [that was] in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5927>"Come<s%> up <S%H6471>once<s%> <S%H6471>more,<s%> for he has <S%H5046>told<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> [that is] in his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>" Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up to her, and <S%H5927>brought<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

And she made him <S%H3462>sleep<s%> on her <S%H1290>knees,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%> and had him <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H1548>off<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of his <S%H7218>hair.<s%> Then she <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> him, and his <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H5493>left<s%> him.

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are upon you, <S%H8123>Samson!<s%>" And he <S%H3364>awoke<s%> from his <S%H8142>sleep<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H3318>go<s%> out as at <S%H6471>other<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> and <S%H5287>shake<s%> myself <S%H5287>free.<s%>" But he did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5493>departed<s%> from him.

Then the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H270>seized<s%> him and <S%H5365>gouged<s%> out his <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> and they <S%H3381>brought<s%> him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H5178>chains,<s%> and he was a <S%H2912>grinder<s%> in the <S%H1004>prison.<s%> <S%H631><s%>
However, the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> again <S%H9201>after<s%> it was <S%H1548>shaved<s%> <S%H1548>off.<s%>

Now the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H622>assembled<s%> to <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> their <S%H430>god,<s%> and to <S%H8057>rejoice,<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Our <S%H430>god<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> our <S%H340>enemy<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands.<s%>"

When the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> him, they <S%H1984>praised<s%> their <S%H430>god,<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Our <S%H430>god<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> our <S%H340>enemy<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands,<s%> Even the <S%H2717>destroyer<s%> of our <S%H776>country,<s%> <S%H834>Who<s%> has <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> of us."

It so <S%H1961>happened<s%> when they were in <S%H2895>high<s%> <S%H3820>spirits,<s%> that they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> that he may <S%H7832>amuse<s%> us." So they <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson<s%> from the <S%H1004>prison,<s%> <S%H631><s%> and he <S%H6711>entertained<s%> <S%H6440><s%> them. And they made him <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars.<s%>

Then <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5288>boy<s%> who was <S%H2388>holding<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> "Let me <S%H4184>feel<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>rests,<s%> that I may <S%H8172>lean<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them."

Now the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H8033>there.<s%> And about 3000 <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%> were on the <S%H1406>roof<s%> <S%H7200>looking<s%> on while <S%H8123>Samson<s%> was <S%H7832>amusing<s%> [them].

Then <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> me and <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> me <S%H389>just<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6471>time,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> that I may at <S%H259>once<s%> be <S%H5358>avenged<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> for my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>"

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3943>grasped<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>rested,<s%> and <S%H5564>braced<s%> himself <S%H5921>against<s%> them, the <S%H259>one<s%> with his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> with his <S%H8040>left.<s%>

And <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines!<s%>" And he <S%H5186>bent<s%> with all his <S%H3581>might<s%> so that the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on the <S%H5633>lords<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in it. So the <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he <S%H4191>killed<s%> at his <S%H4194>death<s%> were <S%H7227>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> those <S%H834>whom<s%> he <S%H4191>killed<s%> in his <S%H9132>life.<s%>

Then his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his father's <S%H1>household<s%> <S%H1004>came<s%> <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H3381>took<s%> him, <S%H5375>brought<s%> him up, and <S%H5927>buried<s%> him <S%H6912>between<s%> <S%H996>Zorah<s%> and <S%H6881>Eshtaol<s%> in the <S%H847>tomb<s%> of <S%H6913>Manoah<s%> his father. Thus he had <S%H4495>judged<s%> <S%H8199>Israel<s%> <S%H3478>twenty<s%> <S%H6242>years.<s%>
